classes.comment: Service class for managing user operations

methods.name: promoteToAdmin
methods.body: return this.updateUser(userId, { role: UserRole.ADMIN });

methods.name: demoteFromAdmin
methods.body: return this.updateUser(userId, { role: UserRole.USER });

getAllAdmins
methods.body: return this.getUsersByRole(UserRole.ADMIN);

methods.name: getAllModerators
methods.body: return this.getUsersByRole(UserRole.MODERATOR);

methods.name: hasErrors
methods.comment: Check if form has any errors
methods.body: return this.errors.size > 0;

methods.name: getFieldErrors
methods.comment: Get errors for a specific field
methods.body: return this.errors.get(field) || [];

methods.name: getAllErrors
clear
methods.body: this.errors.clear();

methods.name: clearField
methods.comment: Clear errors for a specific field
methods.body: this.errors.delete(field);

methods.name: validateEmail
methods.body:
const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
return emailRegex.test(email);

methods.name: validateName
methods.body: return name.trim().length >= 2 && name.trim().length <= 50;

methods.name: validateUserRole
methods.body: return Object.values(UserRole).includes(role as UserRole);

sanitizeString
methods.body: return input.trim().replace(/[<>]/g, '');

methods.name: generateUserId
methods.body: return Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9);

methods.name: isValidUserRole
methods.body: return Object.values(UserRole).includes(role as UserRole);
